properties.publicRemarks:
Your Rancho Mirage Oasis Awaits: 12-16 Month Luxury Lease

Imagine settling into a completely reimagined desert retreat, where every detail exudes modern elegance and effortless living. This isn't just a rental; it's a lifestyle upgrade. Available for a long-term 12-16-month turnkey furnished lease, this stunning Rancho Mirage residence, situated on a desirable corner lot, has undergone a breathtaking, no-expense-spared remodel completed in 2023. Prepare to be captivated from the moment you arrive.

Beautiful curb appeal and lush, new desert landscaping, dramatically illuminated both front and back, lead you through a gated courtyard and into a world of sophisticated design. Custom double doors welcome you to an expansive open-concept home, boasting nearly 2,400 sqft of exquisitely appointed living space.

Step onto elegant large format Limestone flooring that flows seamlessly throughout. The inviting living area features a chic fireplace with integrated TV and custom built-ins, creating a perfect ambiance for relaxation and entertainment.

For the culinary enthusiast, the open-concept gourmet kitchen is a dream come true. Revel in the beauty of granite slab and Quartz countertops and backsplash, the convenience of wall oven, and the abundance of stylish cabinetry.

This exceptional home offers unparalleled comfort with 3 spacious bedrooms and 4.25 luxurious baths. The primary retreat is a true sanctuary, complete with a spa-like en-suite bath featuring a deep soaker tub, separate shower, and generous closet space. Guests will feel pampered in the dedicated guest suite, while the versatile office suite can easily transform into an additional guest bedroom to suit your needs.

Step outside to your own private paradise. The elevated backyard boasts panoramic mountain views that will take your breath away. Enjoy sunny afternoons by the sparkling saltwater lap pool and spa, entertain on the spacious deck, or gather around the built-in BBQ island. Mature fruit trees add a touch of natural beauty to the meticulously landscaped grounds.

Location is everything, and this residence offers the best of Rancho Mirage. Enjoy close proximity to the prestigious Mission Hills Country Club, as well as effortless access to a wide array of shopping, restaurants, and excellent schools.

Don't miss this rare opportunity to experience luxurious desert living at its best.

properties.publicRemarks:
Versatile Home with Income Potential in Prime Location — No HOA & You Own the Land!
Looking for a home that offers flexibility, comfort, and potential rental income? This beautifully located 3-bedroom, 2-bath home in Cathedral City comes with a 400 sq ft studio apartment — perfect for guests, in-laws, or generating extra income to offset your mortgage!
The main home features updated bathrooms, dual-pane windows, and a light, functional layout. Step into your private backyard oasis, ideal for year-round enjoyment with a commercial-grade misting system and a low-maintenance Alumawood patio cover — designed to keep the space cool and comfortable even during summer.
The tasteful  studio apartment includes a spacious kitchen, 3/4 bath, a bedroom that fits a king-size bed, a cozy living area, and a brand-new mini-split system for efficient heating and cooling.
Located in a quiet, well-maintained neighborhood surrounded by Rancho Mirage, you'll enjoy a low-wind area, no HOA fees, and you own the land — a rare find in the Coachella Valley. Just minutes to Palm Springs, Palm Desert, and all the dining, shopping, and entertainment in between.
Live in one unit and rent the other, use it as a guest suite, or make it a private retreat — the possibilities are endless.

properties.publicRemarks:
Welcome to the spectacular residence of 9 Regency Drive, located in the prestigious Morningside Country Club in Rancho Mirage. This nearly 5,000 sq/ft 4 Bed, 5.5 Bath South facing fully remodeled and redesigned home is the latest premier home designed by the team at Chaz Stevens Design, based out of Los Angeles and Palm Springs. This free-standing lake front home is situated on one of the largest  lots in the community with a completely re-designed and engineered pool that overlooks the stunning Southern Santa Rosa Mountain range. 

From the moment you walk in you will experience a unique glass enclosed zen garden with cascading waterfall and bubbling fountain. An open floor plan highlighted by a soaring great room, custom fireplace, modern bar, and dining room that easily accommodates 8.
The home features: 2' x 4' tile throughout, custom built Italian designed cabinetry, a large chef's kitchen with an island, secondary sink, and peninsula, wall oven, 6-burner commercial range, and a brand new Sub-zero paneled refrigerator. This home is the epitome of modern living with a huge primary suite  including fire place with sitting area. The separate primary bathrooms have their own showers, closets, and water closets - providing a spa-like experience (one of the bathrooms features a free-standing soaker tub). Lovely views of the private gardens can be enjoyed from both primary bathrooms. Multiple entertaining areas complete the backyard space, with a gas fire pit and a built-in bbq kitchen with outdoor motorized, retractable awnings. 
This is the ultimate home for those who like to entertain and/or are avid art collectors. With no expense spared, this home has been transformed to quite possibly one of the best homes in the Morningside community. 
Call today to schedule your own private showing

properties.publicRemarks: Sensational, unobstructed, south Facing, Double Fairway, lake and mountain views! On the golf course! Totally remodeled & updated! Pristine clean, light and open zen vibe with new flooring & automated shades throughout! Gorgeous remodeled gourmet open kitchen. Beautiful cathedral ceiling in the living room. The spacious master suite offers amazing views with dual bathrooms with a large walk in closet. Excellent separation of the three bedrooms suites. One bedroom is currently used as an office. Gorgeous side yard, and lots of space for entertaining. Association heated pool and spa conveniently close by! Minutes to Palm Springs, the airport and El Paseo for shopping, dining and entertainment!

properties.publicRemarks: Spacious, updated home with everything you love about Rancho Mirage nearby. Close to restaurants, shopping and entertainment with the quiet feel of a secluded community.  Spacious living room, kitchen, dining room with den-home office, 2 bedrooms and 1 & 3/4 baths. Community now only allows double and larger homes, so when a single leaves, the lot will remain vacant. Lot rent includes maintenance of public areas, homeowner responsible for home lot maintenance. 2 pools, spa, spacious clubhouse and on -site property manager provide a well maintained, secure environment. Small pets welcome!

properties.publicRemarks:
Experience the epitome of modern luxury in this fully furnished, remodeled contemporary home overlooking a serene lake and the 18th fairway of the Dinah Shore Tournament Course. The entrance opens to a spacious courtyard, offering abundant outdoor living space. Inside, the remodeled kitchen, featuring a large island, is perfect for culinary delights, while the open concept encourages socializing in the adjoining great room. The living room and formal dining area provide breathtaking views of the lake, complemented by a contemporary 
fireplace and convenient bar with quartz counters throughout the home. Step onto the expansive back patio to enjoy impressive views of the golf course, mountains and lake, creating a private and tranquil space to unwind. The primary bedroom also features stunning views and a remodeled ensuite bathroom with a spacious shower and double vanities. Each guest bedroom has its own private bathroom adjacent, ensuring comfort and privacy. A golf cart is available in the garage for tenants to use during their stay.
This residence seamlessly blends comfort and sophistication, inviting you to savor lakeside living with breathtaking views. Welcome to contemporary elegance in a spectacular natural setting. House cleaning service is included in the lease price as well as the use of a golf cart. Not Available Jan. through April 2026.

properties.publicRemarks: $100,000 PRICE REDUCTION!! and OWNER FINANCING at 3.75% per annum with 20% down payment. Oakmont Estates in Mission Hills Country Club. .Wonderful home with completely new kitchen cabinets, quartz counter tops and new top of the line appliances. All new Interior paint, large entry courtyard with fireplace and access to most interior space. 3 bedrooms and 4 baths in 3075 sqft. plus large family room, breakfast room and combination large living and dining rooms all with new wood flooring and spectacular south mountain views. The master suite is spa like with large shower, spa tub and workout room. The rear yard has pool and spa with spray features as well as a gas fire pit for those  cool evenings. The covered patio is equipped with misters and there is owned solar. The three car garage plus storage finishes off this resort home. The seller is offering financing with 20% down payment at 3.75% interest only per annum, payable monthly. Call your realtor today and come take a look.
